scripts.build: vite build --config vite.client.config.ts && vite build && npm run postbuild
scripts.postbuild: npm run copy-assets && npm run use-minified
scripts.copy-assets: cp -r public/images dist/ && cp -r public/data dist/ && echo 'Copied assets'
scripts.use-minified: for f in public/static/*.min.js; do [ -f "$f" ] && cp "$f" dist/static/$(basename "${f%.min.js}.js"); done && echo 'Using minified JS'
scripts.deploy: npm run build && wrangler pages deploy dist
